content.3: Call unto me, and I will answer thee, and shew thee great and mighty things, which thou knowest not.
content.5: They come to fight with the Chaldeans, but
content.6: Behold, I will bring it health and cure, and I will cure them, and will reveal unto them the abundance of peace and truth.
content.7: And I will cause the captivity of Judah and the captivity of Israel to return, and will build them, as at the first.
content.8: And I will cleanse them from all their iniquity, whereby they have sinned against me; and I will pardon all their iniquities, whereby they have sinned, and whereby they have transgressed against me.
content.9: And it shall be to me a name of joy, a praise and an honour before all the nations of the earth, which shall hear all the good that I do unto them: and they shall fear and tremble for all the goodness and for all the prosperity that I procure unto it.

content.14: Behold, the days come, saith the
content.15: In those days, and at that time, will I cause the Branch of righteousness to grow up unto David; and he shall execute judgment and righteousness in the land.
content.16: In those days shall Judah be saved, and Jerusalem shall dwell safely: and this
content.18: Neither shall the priests the Levites want a man before me to offer burnt offerings, and to kindle meat offerings, and to do sacrifice continually.
content.22: As the host of heaven cannot be numbered, neither the sand of the sea measured: so will I multiply the seed of David my servant, and the Levites that minister unto me.
